title: Determining greater mass from collision data

content.question: Two blocks are on a horizontal, frictionless surface. Block A is moving with an initial velocity of v0 toward block B, which is stationary, as shown above. The two blocks collide, stick together, and move off with a velocity of v0/3 . Which block, if either, has the greater mass?

choices.label: Neither; their masses are the same.
The answer cannot be determined without knowing the mass of one of the blocks.

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
